root.entry: a person who claims to live according to a philosophy based on that of the fictional Jedi, a caste of wizards in the Star Wars series of films by George Lucas, US film director
Slang. very impressive: That new white convertible is totally awesome.
Six Sigma is a business management strategy originally developed by Motorola, USA in 1986. As of 2010, it is widely used in many sectors of industry, although its use is not without controversy.
a type of music combining jazz, soul, rhythm and blues, funk, and hip-hop; also called jazz vibes
